message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $12000. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $11500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. We believe in making high-quality products accessible to those who appreciate their true worth. Let's make this deal happen! If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
